General.Name: Hang Xiao Steel Structure Co Ltd
General.Description: Hang Xiao Steel Structure Co.,Ltd designs, manufactures, and constructs steel structure products in China and internationally. It operates through Construction, Building Materials, and Others segments. The company also engages in production, sale, and installation of steel structure products and building panels. In addition, it designs, manufactures, and constructs light steel structures, bridge steel structures, long-span space steel structures, multi-high-rise steel structures, super high-rise steel structures, steel structure residences, and green building materials. The company's products are widely used in office buildings, large factories, residences, hospitals, schools, stadiums, exhibition centers, high-speed rail stations, airports, roads, bridges, etc. Hang Xiao Steel Structure Co.,Ltd was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Qiong  Xu
1.Title: CFO & Head of the Accounting Department
